string.text: ERROR 001: Could not serialize Settings.xml: {ERROR} Using default values!
ERROR 002: NPC Party's companions have been disabled for now!
ERROR 003: Serialized Listener for MapEventEnded could not be created. NPC Party's Promotion chance reset to 0.
ERROR 004: There was a problem:{NEWLINE}{ERROR}
Distringuished Service Redux loaded successfully
Using Modules/DistringuishedServerviceUpdated Settings
At maximum allowed companions. No nominations possible.
USING EXTERNAL NAMELIST FILE!{NEWLINE}This file will be written back to/edited to knock out used names.

Max nominations = {MAX}{NEWLINE}Tier Threshold = {TTHRESH}{NEWLINE}Kill Thresh.:{NEWLINE}Infantry = {KTHRESH} Cavarly = {CTHRESH} Ranged = {RTHRESH} Mouted Archer = {MATHRESH}{NEWLINE}Performance Thresh. = {PTHRESH}
MLBW compatibility mode:{NEWLINE}Using first equipment sets
CAUTION 005: Troops will auto-promote to heros at tier {TTHRESH}{NEWLINE}Change settings if this is unintended.
CAUTION: New hero perks will be assigned automatically.{NEWLINE}Change settings if this is unintended.
CAUTION 007: Ignoring companion limit.
CAUTION 009: No wanderer template with culture {CULTURE} available.{NEWLINE} Choosing randomly instead
CAUTION 013: Something went wrong with this unit's equipment.{NEWLINE}Aborting process, not everything might be added properly.
CAUTION 014: Reflection call to CheckInitialLevel failed. Potential version issue.
WARNING 010: SOMETHING ACTUALLY WENT WRONG WITH WANDERER TEMPLATES{NEWLINE}PICKING COMPLETELY RANDOMLY
WARNING 011: Could not find valid wanderer template. You broke something.
Equipment format issue, providing default equipment instead! Exception details:{NEWLINE}{TEXT}
Well, uh, I guess it beats prison...
If it means I don't get chained up, it sounds good to me!
Deal - I never liked the other guy anyway.
Deal. Working with you seems like the safest bet.
I like your proposition! We shall face more glorious battle together!
Uh... Sure, why not.
I just can't accept!
I can't just join with whoever's most convenient! The whole system would fall apart!
I would never betray my commander like that!
No - I won't throw my life away for somebody who hasn't earned it.
I just want to retire after this! No deal!

Take these companions into your party...
I wish to reassign heroes in your party...

That is all.
